K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:468b-1: a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva ra ae ka da sha mu kha ma n'a ma dha ra n'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:468b-3: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig ba ces bya ba'i gzugs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:468b-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:468b-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang du mas yongs su bskor te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:468b-7: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:468b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lana gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:468b-10: snying po gdong bcu gcig pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:468b-11: sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gcig gis gsungs pa lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:468b-12: de sems can thams cad la sman pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:468b-13: bro nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:468b-16: rmi lam ngan pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:468b-17: dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:469a-0: @469a *// ma zhugs pa rnams dad par bgyi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:469a-1: bgegs dang log 'dren rnams rab tu zhib par bgyi ba'i skad du bshad par bgyi'o; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:469a-2: snying po 'di bsrung bar bgyi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:469a-4: yongs su bzung bar bgyis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:469a-5: zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:469a-8: dug gzhil ba bgyis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:469a-9: gang la la zhig 'gal bar bgyid pa de ma mchis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:469a-14: dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa na bdag gis mthong ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:469a-15: sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:469a-18: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bstod cing dgongs pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:469a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su thugs rangs par mdzad pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:469b-0: bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gi bya ma snyed kyi snga rol na de bzhin gshegs pa @469b padma brgya'i spyan gtsug gis chags pa'i dus 'joms pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bgyi ba byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:469b-1: bdag drang srong du gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa de las 'di mnos lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:469b-2: thos ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:469b-3: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yang thob ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:469b-4: de ltar bdag de [?] snying po 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:469b-5: gces spras bgyid pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:469b-6: de lta lags pas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas gus par bgyis la snying po 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:469b-7: gzhan yid la mi bgyid par rtag tu brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:469b-8: nang par langs nas brgya rtsa brgyad bton na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:469b-9: tshe 'di la yon tan bcu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:469b-11: bro nad ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:469b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:469b-13: des bsgrim mi 'tshal bar nor dang 'bru dang dbyig rnams rnyed par 'gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:469b-14: dgra thams cad khugs shing thul bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:469b-15: rgyal po'i tshogs pa rnams gsong por smra bar sems par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:469b-16: lus la dug gis mi tshugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:469b-17: dbyig dug gis mi tshugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:470a-1: kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:470a-2: mtshon chas mi tshugs par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:470a-3: chab kyis 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:470a-4: zhugs kyis 'gum pa'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:470a-5: dus ma lags par 'gum pas 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so; ;gzhan yang yon tan bzhi yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:470a-6: 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:470a-7: ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:470a-8: ya nga ba ma spangs pas 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:470a-9: 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ba lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:470a-12: 'di nas bskal pa gang+g'a'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed dag gi yang ches snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa mand'a ra ba'i bsung zhes bgyi ba byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:470a-13: de na bdag khyim par gyur pas 'di gzung nas bskal pa bzhi khri'i 'khor ba phyir bsnyil lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:470b-0: bdag gis snying po 'di bton pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgyal ba thams cad @470b kyi snying rje 'jug pa ye shes kyi snying po zhes bgyi ba thob lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:470b-1: gang dag bcing bas bcings pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:470b-2: gang dag bcing ba la thug pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:470b-5: sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nyen pa'i sems can thams cad la bdag gi snying po 'dis gnas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:470b-9: gnod sbyin dang srin po sdang ba rnams kyang snying po 'dis bkug la byams pa'i sems dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:470b-10: snying rje'i sems su bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:470b-11: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:470b-14: de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba lags so; ;lan gcig brjod pas rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi po dag kyang byang bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:470b-15: mtshams ma mchis pa lnga po dag kyang ma lus par 'byad par 'gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:470b-16: ji skad bstan pa bzhin du nan tan bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:470b-18: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ba lags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:470b-20: sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:470b-21: bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:471a-0: @471a *// su zhig bdag gi slad du tshes bcu bzhi 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:471a-1: bco lnga la smyung ba bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:471a-2: de bskal pa bzhi khri'i 'khor ba bsnyil bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:471a-6: sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bas lhag lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:471a-7: bdag gi ming 'dzin pa'i sems can thams cad ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:471a-8: phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:471a-9: bro nad thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:471a-13: yid kyi nyes par spyod pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:471a-14: gang la la zhig cho ga bzhin du sbyor ba bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:471a-15: de dag gi sug par sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:471a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:471a-18: khyod sems can thams cad la de ltar snying rje che ba legs so legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:471a-20: thabs 'dis sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par nus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:471a-21: ngas kyang snying po 'di bzung zhing rjes su yi rang ba byas kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:471b-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems @471b dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:471b-2: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:471b-3: na ma a'arya dzny'a na s'a ga ra bee ro tsa na byu ha r'a dz'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:471b-7: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:471b-10: na ma a'arya ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:471b-13: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:471b-20: pra tsa le pra tsa le /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:471b-24: tsi ti tsva la ma pa na ye sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:471b-26: sgrub mi dgos par las thams cad byed de; rims nyin gcig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:471b-37: bas blngags la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:471b-40: g-yan pa la sogs pa la 'jim pa la bsngags ta bsku'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:471b-41: lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:471b-42: las kyi sgrib pa sbyong bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:471b-43: byis pa gdon gyis zin pa la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:471b-45: rna ba bro 'tshal ba la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:472a-2: sma phro 'tshal ba la gro ba btags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:472a-4: bro nad thams cad la yang sbyar bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:472a-5: bklags pas 'grub bo; ;'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:472a-6: rgya gar gyi mkhan po shri lendra bo dhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-048:472a-7: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
